title: Taoqi Bao Ma Xiao Tiao(movie)
synopsis: The story of the film revolves around Ma Xiaotiao, a third-grade pupil. Ma Xiaotiao is an unusual child, he will jump from birth! In his Zhou Catch Ceremony, the fiery-tempered Ma Xiaotiao jumped to the sky, which surprised everyone. Ma Xiaotiao, a third grader, is always surrounded by the clever "ape" Mao Chao, the gluttonous and sleepy "penguin" Tang Fei, and the infinitely powerful "hippo" Zhang Da. Of course, there are also unconditional super idols. Angel in a small jump. 　　 And Ma Xiaotiao’s idol in his heart is Xia Linguo, a beautiful, intelligent, and excellent “ballet star” in his class. 　　Ma Xiaotiao also has his own opponent in the class, that is, his deskmate Lu Manman and study committee member Ding Wentao. Lu Manman loves to supervise Ma Xiaotiao, Ding Wentao always pours cold water on Ma Xiaotiao. If Lu Manman and Ma Xiaotiao had a conflict like sparks hitting the earth, there would be Teacher Qin, the person Ma Xiaotiao was most afraid of, because Teacher Qin liked the parent named Ma Xiaotiao the most. Ma Xiaotiao’s toy designer father, Ma Tianxiao, is usually invited every time. Ma Tian laughed and played with Baolai not much inferior to Ma Xiaotiao himself. The best example of this is to grab chicken legs with Ma Xiaotiao at the table. 　　 So often "jumping" the horse Xiaotiao soaring to the sky, what kind of interesting story happened in school and his friends? How high did the horse Xiaotiao jump in physical education class? How did the ant army "occupy" Lumanman's red dress? How did Ma Xiaotiao's idol, Xia Linguo, "hold justice" for Ma Xiaotiao? How did Ma Xiaotiao "jump" to see what is right? Can an egg live safely on Ma Xiaotiao for three days? What kind of adventure did Ma Xiaotiao and his friends experience when they went camping...(translated from douban)

title: Chisong Wei Long
synopsis: The heroic young Chisong of Penglai Xianguan was punished by his master Lu Yi and left Songshan to travel around the world. On the way home, Akamatsu accidentally discovered the conspiracy of the Demon Cult and was persecuted by the organization. The Demon Cult harassed the people, spread rumors, and dispatched four monsters "wind, fire, thunder, and electricity" to the common people. After several hardships, Akamatsu joined the princess Diaoman and the general to declare war on the Demon Cult. The three worked together to finally eradicate the Demon Cult and protect their homeland. The people can live and work in peace...(translated from douban)

title: Lu Shu Lin De Gushi
synopsis: The inventor is obviously curious about everything, he likes to make small inventions at every turn. He often wonders what his friends need. Where is Explorer Ali? Like to explore new places. Maybe because of the distance from my mother. Ali is very responsible. She is particularly able to deal with accidents clearly, and she has become a professional accident handling expert. So, obviously and Ali are good friends who can never be separated! [1]  No matter where he and Ali go, there is always someone pestering them, she is just Cha Cha. It is precisely because she likes to sing very much. She never left any opportunity in the village to express her voice, and she thinks that she is beautiful, she always thinks Mingming and Ali like herself very much. But actually. Mingming and Ali didn't care about her, but because they were more soft-hearted, they never made it clear. One day, Pupu and his father came like a green wood. Pupu's father is a very emotional poet. But his son pounced. Quite the opposite of Dad. He felt stunned and speechless. Seeing the princess type Cha Cha did not hesitate to say that it was not beautiful. I never rap well when I listen to Cha Cha singing. Cha Cha, who didn't care about Pupuhao at first, has been different recently. She started to care about Pupu talk! There is a cave in the village. Bo Bo said he has seen ghosts in the cave. As a result, the whole village was noisy for a while. Bobo even beat the ghost. But the cry of ghosts is still ringing: our partners are very scared. But one day in order to see the ghost clearly. Everyone was dispatched. Guess what, it turned out to be a little bat who lost his mother. It lives alone in the cave of this black hole. So, you can’t believe what Bobo said. The little bat Taotao is still small and can't fly, so everyone agreed to help Taotao practice flying. Jiejie, who likes painting, sometimes complains about her friends who can’t understand her work. But since Pupu and they moved in, they felt so happy because they met the poet uncle who understood his works.(translated from douban)

title: Dongwu Kuanghuan Jie
synopsis: The film tells about the sound-seeking bear, kangaroo, and coco donkey in the forest. With their dreams of music and dance, they came to the heart of the music sacred forest. After several catastrophes, they finally tame the representative wind monsters of the evil forces, and finally let the three families, The heart of the forest and the entire animal world present a scene of harmony and joy. Producer Teng Rongjian said that "Animal Carnival" elaborated on the theme of children's continuous growth and parents' continuous improvement. The animal shapes in the film are very cute, the story is bizarre and tortuous, and the combination of narrative and music is very clever. He introduced that, from the story, production to the art design, the film is all original by Chinese artists. It uses modern Chinese stories to interpret classical music. It has a sense of the times and a sense of nationality. The audience can not only comprehend classic music, but also educate the present. If you think deeply about reality, you can also get great satisfaction in entertainment and high aesthetic enjoyment.(translated from douban)

title: Shaonian Bao Qingtian
synopsis: During the Northern Song Dynasty, floods occurred in the north for years, and the victims left their homes and homes, and flooded toward Kaifeng Mansion in Henan Province. In order to fill the hungry stomachs of the victims, the Kaifeng Mansion Super Mind Pouch, which has a unique interest in food and beverage production, mobilized almost all the forces that Kaifeng could mobilize, but it was still a drop in the bucket. At this time, Master Xiao Bao listened to Ma Niu, who served on the left and right, saying that the Zhou members of Chengnan were hoarding strangers and refused to open warehouses for disaster relief. In stark contrast to the victims who had no food to eat, Zhou members guarded the granary and ate Hesai, just waiting for the day when food prices soared. Just as Master Xiao Bao couldn't help Zhou Yuanwai who refused to open a warehouse for disaster relief, Zhou Yuanwai's granary encountered a sudden fire. The victims took advantage of the fire and rushed up and robbed them. This time, it was Zhou's turn to ask for Master Xiao Bao. After some on-site investigations, Master Xiao Bao concluded that the magnifying glass on the high-hanging flag pole of the fire was focused on the fire, and the "culprit" behind it was Zhan Zhao, the guard guarding the granary. But when he heard Ming Zhan Zhao’s initial starting point, not only did Mr. Xiao Bao not put Zhan Zhao in jail, he also took Zhan Zhao under his own hands in the name of Zhan Zhao’s understanding of justice and integrity.(translated from douban)

title: Hei Lian Da Baogong
synopsis: This film is a 58-episode original animated series. It tells the story of Bao Gong taking office in Kaifeng Mansion, leading the Showa Dynasty, Ma Han, Zhang Long, and Zhao Hu to handle a series of strange cases, strange cases, private visits on WeChat, and cleverly with the evil forces such as Pang Taishi. The story of wit and courage. It includes the stories of Baogong published in Hefei, his hometown of Baohe, such as "Lianquan" and "Baohe", as well as a number of well-known classic cases such as "Lianquan" and "Baohe" (translated from douban)

title: Hei Lian Da Baogong Zhi Wu Hui Qingtian
synopsis: The cartoon "The Black Face of Bao Gong: No Regrets Blue Sky" tells the story of Bao Gong clearing the crime of treason for General Di Qing, punishing his unfilial son Song Tianbao, detecting the massacre of Tangjiazhai, protecting the emperor's personal conquests, and breaking the heavens. (translated from douban)

synopsis: On his way to Duanzhou, Bao Zheng encountered a series of thrilling and bizarre cases. Bao Zheng was an upright official, upright and undaunted by power, and solved these cases. (translated from douban)

title: Qiudao
synopsis: The story of the ordinary boy Wu Mingzi who lost his mother and golf takes place on the fringe of the city. In order to realize his dream, the protagonist starts his own golf on the garbage dump on the fringe of the city and develops his gorgeous golf skills. Ten years later, the garbage dump was developed into a stadium, and Wu Mingzi accidentally obtained the qualification to participate in the local youth trials. On the field, Wu Mingzi won the championship in one fell swoop, and received a ticket to participate in the National Junior Golf Tournament. However, Wu Mingzi’s wheel of fortune has begun to reverse. Many accidents have come, and the goal of struggling for many years has become a false lie. Wu Mingzi’s life has fallen to the bottom. With the persuasion and help of his relatives and friends, he defeated himself and fate and won the game. (translated from douban)

title: Xiang Qian Chong, Xiang Qian Chong
synopsis: The protagonist of the story is an ancient coin of our country. An escaped little ant strayed into an antique study. Its arrival awakened all kinds of ancient coins that had been sleeping for several years. The sword coin general Daqi and his wife Luohan Qian Kangkang, displayed in the log box, were dispatched. The scholar-like Kaiyuan Tongbao and the ancient coins of various ages jumped off the desks, and the house suddenly became chaotic. Yuan Datou trot all the way to the corner of the wall and disappeared. Everyone hurried forward to look for it. This place was in full swing. On the other side, the little ant found an indescribable monster under the table leg. He said it was a coin, but it was never seen in the ancient coin group. I found this strange-looking monster. After a long time of trouble, it was actually a contemporary game coin. The coins were discouraged. At this time, the credit card ridiculed that the old coins are a bunch of waste. As soon as this statement comes out, the ancient and modern war will be triggered... ..(translated from douban)

title: Lao Fu Zi Zhi Mojie Meng Zhan Ji
synopsis: After the great inventor, Old Masterzi, won a large number of fans, he and his assistant Dafanshu continued to work on his invention business, and lived an ordinary life with doctor Qin and his father Wang Ze. Unexpectedly, a sudden mysterious package disrupted the peaceful life-a powerful demon king abducted Wang Ze. As a result, kicked off a prelude to a tortuous adventure in the devil world. In order to save Wang Ze and maintain the beauty of fairy tales, Old Master, Da Sweet Potato, and Doctor Qin traveled through time and space, and experienced the legend of the magic lamp, Mulan, the ten brothers, the new Journey to the West... After going through many hardships and tests. Not only did the three old masters rescue Wang Ze, the brilliant story also attracted more fan readers, and the sales of "Old Master Q" reached a new level. All colleagues celebrated together. Unexpectedly, after experiencing a thrilling adventure, the old master who returned to his ordinary life looked at the cookie-cutter celebrations before him, thinking of the repeated days, his heart began to "unwilling to be lonely" again, thinking about the desire to become a real person. One day, he slipped into the street wandering in anguish. Inadvertently walked into the blank page leading to real life in the legend, ignorantly broke into the real world of Hong Kong, and embarked on his journey of real life experience... Along with the endless situation, the experience was full of jokes. A handful of real life, work and love, deduced another wonderful "Old Master" legend...(translated from douban)

title: Laofuzi Mojie Meng Zhan Ji II
synopsis: Episode 1: Devil King Reappears Old Master, Mr. Qin, Big Sweet Potato, and Wang Ze finally returned home safely. They thought they could finally reunite with the family, but Wang Ze disappeared? ! It turned out that the old Zhao was hit by mistake and became a new generation of "Devil Kings," and he even incubated the Devil King's soul into a little prince and a little princess. In order to make himself a real "king of the devil" and to avenge the old master and others, the old Zhao slapped Wang Ze and ordered the three old masters to collect the "devil crystal elements" scattered in different time and space within nine or ninety or eighty days. come back. Episode 2: Oolong Three Kingdoms In order to save Wang Ze, the old master, Mr. Qin, and the sweet potato head were forced to find the "devil world crystal element." Old Zhao even invited A Jia, the tour guide of the devil world, to lead them through different time and space. The first stop was the Three Kingdoms period. They happened to meet Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei. However, they were tricked by the little prince and princess and could not fight at Hulao Pass. Therefore, they might violate the history of the "Three British Wars of Lu Bu." In order to correct the history, the three old masters had no choice but to bite the bullet and pretend to be the three to compete with Lu Bu. ¨¨¨ The three old masters found that they had gone to the wrong time and space and could not find Jingyuan, so they went to the eve of the Battle of Chibi. They shuttled among the characters of the Three Kingdoms era, brushed past Zhuge Liang and Lu Su in "The Straw Boat Borrowing Arrow" and rescued Zhou Yu, who was suspicious of jumping into the river. Dealing with Cao Cao, who was seasick, tried a series of tricks to fight Pang Tong, and witnessed Zhuge Liang borrowing from the east wind on the Seven Stars Altar. The process is thrilling and humorous. In the rush of wind and arrogance, the first "Demon World Crystal Element" is about to appear ¨¨¨ Episode 3: Mighty King Qin On a journey to find the "devil's crystal element", I will go to the Qin Dynasty today. In order to find the "devil's crystal element," the three old masters dressed up as generals of the Qin Dynasty and got to know the old man, but the three did not know their true identities. The three old masters and the old man experienced the construction of the Great Wall and the invasion of the Husbands. With the secret help of the little prince and the little princess, the danger becomes easy. Under the leadership of the old man, the three old masters went to the Taoist cultivating the elixir of life, that is, the place where the "devil world crystal element" appeared. The three old masters continued to search for the "devil world crystal element" in the Qin dynasty, and led by the old man Next, the three of them went to a Taoist temple, which is the elixir of life, because the Taoist temple had abnormal weather conditions. So it is suspected that "Devil World Crystal Element" ever appeared. However, there were so many institutions in the Taoist temple that the three had to ask the "ten brothers" to help. In the Taoist temple, the ten brothers avoided the guards' attack even though they were prompted by the elderly policy. But the real organs are Snow Wolf, Golden Eagle, and Killer Bee. The Ten Brothers are facing many crises. Episode 4: Bao Qingtian's Juvenile Event Book In this episode, the three old masters are taken by A Jia to the Northern Song Dynasty, and once again embark on a journey to find the crystal element of the devil. By a coincidence, the three met the young Bao Zheng and the young Zhanzhao, but Bao Zheng was originally a white-faced scholar rather than a black face in the legend?! On the other hand, Mr. Qin was found to be the murderer without knowing it? The old master and Bao Zheng work together to rescue... The white-faced young Bao Qingtian has accurate analysis capabilities for investigating cases. However, at the critical moment of solving the case, he always has a headache and is extremely painful... After many adventures, he Finally, with the help of the old master, Bao Qingtian became a real black face and charcoal! Episode 5: The Revenge of the King of Chu According to historical records, Xiang Yu is mighty and powerful, and Yu Ji is beautiful. However, during this trip, the old master and the three encountered Xiang Yu and Yu Ji are quite different. When they took the Jingyuan, they inadvertently rescued Xiang Yu who was crowing in Wujiang, and inspired him to fight. They decided to fight Liu Bangyi. war. The three old masters? Taking the crystal elements to falsify the historical facts has caused an uproar. If they want to correct the historical facts, do they want to murder Xiang Yu? Of course the old masters three will not kill Xiang Yu. But before the old Master Zi came up with a way, Xiang Yu was already alone and set out to assassinate Liu Bang. If he succeeded in the assassination, history would be changed, and the world would be chaotic... Finally, the old Master and the three successfully prevented the assassination and made Xiang Yu Yu Ji got a happy ending. On the other hand, the Black Heart King saw Jing Yuan and he was about to get it, and then further revealed to Lao Zhao his actions to rule the Demon World... Episode 6: Fengshen Bang This time, Old Master, Big Sweet Potato and Mr. Qin came to the ancient Fengshen Bang era. The three of them were convinced that the Demon Realm Jingyuan would appear at the moment when Jiang Ziya was consecrating the gods, so they stood quietly, waiting for Jingyuan to show up... However, the naughty little princess stole the "Fengshen List", and the old master was at a loss for a while. . In order to stabilize the overall situation, Big Sweet Potato had to look around for the whereabouts of the little princess. On the other hand, in order to prevent Jiang Ziya from discovering that "The Conferred God List" was missing, the old master asked his pen pal to draw a fake Conferred God List? ! In the last time, the cunning old Zhao used a trick to make the little princess change the "Feng Shen Bang Bang" into "Feng Mo Bang Bang", and then fell into Jiang Ziya's hands. Jiang Ziya didn’t take it seriously. Just when he was ennouncing the gods, he read aloud the text on the "Devil Sealing List", turning all the immortals into demon generals...Although the old master and three got the fifth demon crystal element, but The little prince's skill has been taken back by Zhao, and now he can only turn Wang Ze back into a five-year-old child. Want to restore Wang Ze to his original state, are they going to kneel down to Lao Zhao for help? Episode 7: After the Demon World's self-appointed demons, the old Zhao immediately ordered the demons Nezha, Lei Zhenzi and Yang Jian to deal with the old master, so that he could save the Black Heart King. Seeing that the crisis was looming, the old master and others had to transform together to fight against foreign enemies... At the same time, the little princess secretly turned into a bird to seize "The Seal of Demons", and used clever tricks to change it back to the "List of Gods" in order to make all immortals. Revert to the original state. But the Black Heart King has found that Big Sweet Potato has found a crystal element to solve the problem of opening the seal. He decided to inhale the Big Sweet Potato and the crystal element together! After occupying the body of the big sweet potato, the Black Heart King turned him into a super giant "black heart big sweet potato" and manipulated him to destroy it everywhere. In order to defeat the Black Heart King and rescue the Big Sweet Potato, the old Master Zi and others decided to stay in the Demon Realm to seek a good strategy... Later, the old master learned from the "Elder of the Lake Tree" that he must first personally deal with the "Black Heart Big Sweet Potato" and enter it. The heart can save the sealed big sweet potato. Although the old master hesitated for a while, but still willing to take a risk for his friends, how will things go on?(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Yingtao
synopsis: 52 episodes of cartoon Little Cherry, divided into 26 episodes in the first part and 26 episodes in the second part. In a small town named Cherry City, there is a fourth-grade elementary school student Xiaotao. During her growth, she encountered a series of fun and troubles. Due to her innocent and lively, cheerful personality, humorous and assertive, she is good at expressing her own ideas. Views and opinions, no matter what the situation is, they can always be concluded in a humorous way. Little Cherry's humorous character and sincere and kind-hearted qualities make her a very favorite person among classmates, teachers and parents. The play will evoke people's fond memories of childhood, and guide young people to correctly view and deal with various problems encountered in the process of growth, learning and life. The play uses "humorous childhood" as a clue, and revolves around Xiao Cherry’s school, family, and daily life. It uses humorous artistic techniques to show the joys, sorrows, sorrows and joys of today’s teenagers, as well as the beautiful friendship between classmates and teachers. And family affection, showing the beauty of harmony between man and nature. The film is based on the real society and runs through the beautiful emotions and spirits of human beings, such as kindness, sincerity, friendship and hard work. Each episode has an independent story, and each episode explains a principle of being a person and doing things, getting rid of boring preaching and Knowledge instillation allows the audience to appreciate the philosophy of life in a relaxed and humorous atmosphere, which is very close to the real life of young people. The story of the play is positive, humorous and lovely, full of optimistic attitude, and filled with the sincerity and happiness of childhood. It will play a positive role in helping young people develop good thinking and behavior habits, and promoting the ideological and moral construction of minors. (translated from douban)

title: Zhihui Zhi Cheng
synopsis: The happiest thing for the invention-loving teenager Qizhen is to watch the "Dream Power" program of the City of Wisdom. In this issue of the "Dream Power" program, the famous inventor Dr. Z from the City of Hope takes everyone to the City of Wisdom and visits To the three elders who protect creativity in the city, the elders introduced a new thing-intellectual property. So with his dream, he went to the City of Wisdom, determined to become a great inventor. In the city, he met another inventor-Sima Da. They were attracted by each other's invention and became best friends. With the help of three elders and Dr. Z, the two friends learned how to use Proper methods to protect one's own inventions and creations, to fight against illegal activities, and finally left eternal footprints in the honor of the City of Wisdom-the Holy Way of Wisdom.(translated from baidu baike)

synopsis: The white-haired witch rescued a group of unknown children, taught them martial arts, and used her life's hard work to forge seven swords. After that, she passed away in tears. Because the person she likes is already dead (translated from douban)

title: Hudie Yu Bai Shu Xianzi
synopsis: The story mainly tells the story of Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai who worked hard to build a happy home in the Western Vegetable Garden and Baishu Fairies and Insect Elves. The whole story is based on caring for the environment, awakening human beings and protecting our common home, supplemented by Liang Zhu’s beautiful love story, combined with the scenery of Guan Lun Meiyang, giving people visual enjoyment and spiritual joy. Liang Zhu's story is called "Romeo and Juliet" by Dongwan and has a high recognition. Environmental protection is the topic of current public concern. The perfect combination of the two will become a major feature of this film.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Diaoman Gongzhu Gang Fuma
synopsis: The world's first Cantonese opera animated film "The Diaoman Princess and the gangster" This is a famous Cantonese opera repertoire. It describes the emperor's female Princess Fengxia and the Sanguan coach Meng Feixiong who "examined each other" in the palace due to their differences, but they had love. Husbands and wives should respect each other and regard harmony as the most important thing to make the family happy. Xi Rong Beidi used Princess Fengxia to laugh at their Tuo back lame envoys and attacked China with troops. Sanguan Marshal Meng Feixiong broke the enemy and captured the general. Because the princess ridiculed the envoys and incurred foreign troubles, he asked the court to investigate the crime. Princess Fengxia was smart and beautiful, and she was deeply pampered by the emperor. The upper lip of the Golden Palace convinced the two captives and made Meng Feixiong to fall in love. The princess also loves Meng Fei, who is wise and courageous, and the queen promises marriage. On the day of marriage, Fei Xiong was angry, and the princess was savage, so that the good night was wasted, and the horse was demoted to a monk. Zen Master Lekong is a caring person, and under his mercy, the couple will eventually become a loving couple.(translated from douban)

title: A Li·Meng Zhi Chengbao
synopsis: Living in the city of dreams, Ari has always dreamed of becoming a dream-picking hero. But in reality, Ari and his team members: the alarm clock and the paper man, are the ridiculous and incompetent squad in the dream catching team. One day, Ari accidentally collected the dream of a blind little girl, and the fate of the two began to be tied. However, just as Ali and the little girl became good friends, an unprecedented crisis also appeared in Dream City. So, can Ari become a hero who saves the city of dreams? What kind of fantasy journey will he and the little girl embark on? (translated from douban)

title: A Li Tonghua Gushi Ji Di 2 Ji
synopsis: Ari discovered that there are many people in this world. Although they have experienced growth, they have lost their childlike innocence and become confused, numb and lonely. Ari helps them regain their confidence through experience and adventure. During this period, he helped the gluttonous hamster to find his own position and value, and helped the scavengers collect stars and send them back to the sky. Ari and Taozi Daxiong strayed into a mysterious chessboard and defeated the proud white queen of chess through wisdom and courage. Ari helps a grumpy gentleman who has lost his partner to find lost love and memories. In the small town theater, Ari learned that the ideal of marionette is to be a dancer. Ari encourages him to pursue himself bravely and not be afraid of failure. In the end, the marionette was blessed by fate.(translated from douban)

It tells the story of Ari's travels and encounters various lost and helpless little friends. Ari uses his love and magic method to help them get out of their spiritual dilemma and create a world of miracles in fairy tales. (translated from douban)

title: Fan Dou TianTing
synopsis: Legend has it that the Heavenly Court is the center of the fairy world, and is inhabited by gods such as the Zodiac, the Jade Emperor, and the God of Wealth, which is like a peaceful and peaceful small society. However, when the animals were preparing for the New Year, the Nian beast, who was a gambler, went bankrupt and robbed the God of Wealth who was in charge of wealth. As a result, each of the Chinese zodiac signs formed a miscellaneous army with motives to go to the Devil to save the God of Wealth. The spacecraft that passed through the different-dimensional space first encountered the impact of meteor swarms and was forced to fall into a confused wilderness... Finally, it came to the colorful and prosperous magic city, and the situation was even more critical. The monkey carrying the rat inspector tried to rush to the devil's palace, but was chased by the mechanical patrolman of the beast, and then the super treacherous big tea and rice was lured from it, and the zodiac strayed into the tunnel.　　 After returning to the Heavenly Court, the archaeologist suddenly appeared with a lot of bones, said "big thing" and died. It turned out that the fleas attached to the bones brought a curse: Brother Long will transform into a ferocious dragon on the next lunar eclipse night and destroy the heavens. Only by eating the toenails of the legendary King Xilong can the curse be resolved. Was he expelled from the Heavenly Court by the Jade Emperor, or must he venture into the wild forest to find the West Dragon King? Brother Long can’t make a choice... 　　 For some reason, all the villagers in Heping Village have become murderous and terrifying zombies. The six relatives don’t recognize them. Fortunately, Master Longshan drew his sword in time to help, but his coin formation can only last for two hours. A monkey poisoned by a corpse. Brother Tiger crossed the blurry realm, got rid of the obstacles of the demons, finally got the glutinous rice that can heal the monkeys, but it was too late...(translated from douban)

title: Fan Dou Tianting Zhi Tezhong Budui

title: Bao Hulu De Mimi
synopsis: Elementary school student Wang Bao (Zhu Qilong) is innocent and lively and likes to fantasize. Whenever he encounters difficulties in study or troubles in his after-school life, he fantasizes about a magical baby appearing to help him achieve his goals easily. One day, while fishing, Wang Bao came across the legendary Bao Gourd (voiced by Chen Peisi), who was able to help the owner realize any wish. He was overjoyed. Bao Gourd not only helped Wang Bao catch fish, made advanced models, completed extracurricular homework, and transformed into various This shape makes him happy. Wang Bao’s rapid progress in the school surprised the students. Teacher Liu (Gigi Leung) also changed his original look at him, and Bao Hulu helped him show his power in the swimming pool and easily got the chance to join the school team. His life is closer to perfection. However, Wang Bao gradually discovered that Bao Hulu was originally indiscriminate and only knew how to obey blindly...(translated from douban)
background: This anime won The 26th China Film Golden Rooster Awards Best Children's Film.

title: Qi Tian Da Sheng Qianchuan
synopsis: Monkey King (voiced by He Jiong) has no father or mother, he is a rock monkey that pops out of a rock. With his extraordinary courage and wisdom, Monkey King quickly found a place for himself in the group of monkeys, and became the monkey king leading all the monkeys in one fell swoop. However, after witnessing the death of an elderly monkey, Monkey King doubted his own existence and meaning. He decided to embark on a journey to find a way to immortalize himself. 　　 Monkey King met Bodhi Patriarch and became his apprentice. After going through all kinds of hardships and dangers, he finally cultivated Zhengguo. After that, he came to the East China Sea Dragon Palace again, turned the Dinghai Shenzhen into his handy weapon, the Golden Cudgel, and thus mastered a powerful force. An accident caused Monkey King to break into the underworld in the midst of a hit and miss, get the life and death book of Lord Yan, and thus obtain eternal life.(translated from douban)

title: Meng Hui Jinsha Cheng
synopsis: Xiaolong is a self-centered child who usually lacks love and responsibility for others. In the dark and windy night of a month, a puppy took him through the time tunnel and returned to the Golden Sands 3500 years ago. At this time, the Kingdom of Sands was controlled by an abnormal energy from the forest. General She decided to absorb positive energy to destroy the abnormal energy. Unexpectedly, it was counterproductive. After absorbing a large amount of energy, General She could not control the powerful energy body. Once the energy exploded, Sands The country will be unimaginable. Xiaolong was attracted by the magnificent scenery of Jinsha Country. He didn't know the disaster he was about to face. Knowing from the mouth of Princess Hua'er and the idol that the jade he was wearing could save the Jinsha Kingdom, he took it off without hesitation. In the end, everyone saved the precarious Sands Country with love. After returning to contemporary times, people discovered that Xiaolong had changed... (translated from douban)

title: Chao Wa Zhanshi Zhi Xingji Jiayuan
synopsis: The Ti tribe quickly attacked the frogman country for resources, and the frog tribe began to defend quickly after losing multiple immigrant planets. 　　 Steel Beast, Kang, Baker, Cannon and others resisted the invasion of the Ladder tribe and entered the military academy. They met at the Mecha Army Academy and soon became good friends. Several people first got to know hereditary, and then participated in the supply mission of Fengyan and Captain Ming, and met Captain Ming and other front-line combatants who everyone admired. Everyone was very excited, but the original safe supply mission was attacked by the echelon's generals such as the emperor and Lipton. Fengyan fought back in order to protect the cadets. The Second Fleet was almost annihilated. 　　The senior frog clan was dissatisfied with the defeat. Captain Ming took all the responsibilities on himself, and he shed tears for Fengyan's sacrifice. The high-levels are preparing to form the second fleet again, and the cadets headed by the steel beasts and others have also accepted the award and formally incorporated into the AIU commando team and become Captain Ming's generals. This is what they dream of. At the same time, the two brothers Shangguan Wolf and Shangguan Eagle, who were hunted down by the invaders, made amazing progress after entering the military academy, and they accidentally saw the crystallization of the frog clan's most advanced ship technology-the fishbone assault ship. The frogs are brewing a major self-defense counterattack... (translated from douban)

title: Hu Wang Guilai
synopsis: In order to find the sister abducted by the tiger, Wu Xiaosong, who was only eight years old, came to Jingyanggang with a big sword on his back. The proprietress of the inn tried to obstruct Wu Xiaosong, so she claimed that minors were not allowed to drink. She didn't know that Wu Xiaosong was so ambitious that she actually used milk instead of wine and drank eight bowls in one breath. 　　 After passing the level of the inn proprietress, Wu Xiaosong continued to move forward. He not only possesses a good kung fu, but also understands the language of animals and is able to talk to animals. Zhou Laohu had thick skin and thick skin, and claimed to be invulnerable, but he was defeated by Wu Xiaosong. Afterwards, the flying tiger with wings and able to fly also came to block the way, but Wu Xiaosong took care of it. Soon, Wu Xiaosong came to the Grand Canyon of the New Year of the Tiger, where the majestic and powerful Tiger King lived. In the face of powerful enemies, can Wu Xiaosong show his true strength without fear?(translated from douban)

title: Hao Hao Wenzi Guo
synopsis: The film is the first Chinese education cartoon in China. Through the adventures of Haohao, a little boy who often writes typos, in the kingdom of characters, the method of distinguishing and evolving Chinese characters is conveyed to small audiences in the form of fairy tales, avoiding the use of words. , Has changed the rote and boring traditional education method, and taught Chinese knowledge in a subtle way. The cartoon characters in the play are very cute. Haohao's upside-down cap has a strand of hair that shows a naughty and stubborn personality. "Uncle Rubber" has a simple appearance, "Sister Si", wise and intellectual, and "Brother Ink". Small and agile, the "Ten Day Brothers" are brave and fearless, and the animated characters have both shape and spirit to make the audience linger.(translated from douban)

title: Duobiao
synopsis: The film tells the story of a group of roller skating teenagers headed by Xiaoqiang for the same hobby. On the road of pursuing roller skating skills, they have experienced various setbacks and tribulations, choices and trials, and gradually grew up, and finally relied on their unwavering belief in roller skating. The world has harvested stories of dreams, friendship and love. (translated from douban)

title: Qin Shi Mingyue specials
synopsis: specials of Qin Shi Mingyue

title: Shibo Zongdongyuan
synopsis: In the 1950s, the ancient China Land was still under the feudal rule of the Manchu Qing government. Remaining on its own feet and shutting down the country, this country has long been behind the times without knowing it. Of course, in the era of drastic changes, there are still people who try to open their eyes to the world and show the beauty of the world with the culture that their country is proud of. In 1851, the first World Expo was held in London, England. Chinese businessman Xu Rongcun won gold and silver medals with "Rongji Lake Silk". A hundred years later, Hu Sizi, a descendant of Xu Rong Village, dismissed the silk crafts handed down by the family. He is obsessed with modern technology and is eager to build sophisticated robots, but he has no spirit of teamwork. 　　 After suffering a setback, he inadvertently entered the mysterious world of ancient silk, so he embarked on a strange journey...(translated from douban)

title: Xiyu Chuanqi
synopsis: It tells the story of the ups and downs, the bizarre treasure hunt, and the rescue of the common people that occurred on a beautiful and fertile "Golden Mountain" in western China-the ancient Western Regions, the prince of natural power, the magical secrets and treasures-these legendary elements plus The exquisite production is enough to attract the audience's attention. (translated from douban)

title: Fadian Zhi Mi Zhi Haidi Tao Fa
synopsis: The little prince of Kingdom W loves traveling the most. The king often scolds him for not studying hard, but the little prince does not regard it as the same thing. However, in order to punish him this time, the king actually asked him to travel again! This journey is not easy, because it is a legal code journey! 　　 Solving the mystery of the "Code" is a must for the successive kings of the Kingdom of W to ascend to the throne, but the little prince only viewed this trip with a ticket-minded attitude. When he lightly pressed his hand on the code, the code immediately exerted its magical power, involving the little prince, his guard, the big ear cow, and the palace pet, into the world of the code... In this way, the little prince and his party began their code. The first stop of the journey-the submarine washing method.(translated from douban)

title: Huanle Baobao
synopsis: "Happy Baby" is an animation with children's image as the theme. Huanhuan, Lele, Doudou, Tuantuan, and Yuanyuan are five cute animated images with different personalities in "Happy Baby". "Happy Babies" is a domestically produced original anime that takes these 5 cute babies as the protagonists, combines the psychology of children aged 3 to 12, and uses rich resources such as various habits, common sense, and popular science knowledge encountered by children in life and study. The theme, in the form of relaxed, vivid, vivid, and funny, promotes good life and study habits to children, masters the most basic science knowledge in life, and subtly educates them on morality and intelligence. (translated from douban)

title: Chinzei Hachirou Tametomo
synopsis: Kamimine Town, located in the eastern part of Saga Prefecture, is a place associated with the legendary military commander Minamoto no Tametomo, who is said to be "Yoshitsune in the east, Tametomo in the west." Here, he called himself "Hachirou Chinzei" and built a castle. Chinzei and his army is said to have defeated 50,000 enemies, and many legends were left behind. A master of bows and a big man, Chinzei had a rough temper and was even called a violent person by nature. But he was also a person with warmth and kindness full of humanity. (Source: Production I.G., translated)
background: Anime short that was part of Saga Prefecture's PR Campaign

title: Maomao Wang Lixian Ji
synopsis: The entire fairy tale revolves around two rare treasures, the "Golden Cudgel" and the manuscript of "Journey to the West". In the middle of the distant sea, there is a mysterious island—Maomao Island. According to legend, it is the place where the Maomao tribe, descendants of Monkey King, lived, and the appearance of King Li, the descendant of the Bull Demon King, broke the tranquility on Maomao Island. King Li sent his subordinates of the Five Elements King to take away Maomao and other young Mao tribe members as hostages and threatened the Maomao tribe to surrender the golden hoop. In order to rescue his companions and save the world, the brave King Mao Mao started his adventure, taking a set of "72 cross-dressing cards" and "baby monkey" sent by Master Mao, and met the young scientist Zhu Zhu and the infinite little girl Tao After Taobao officially embarked on the journey. The legend is Monkey King's descendant Golden Cudgel" and the "Journey to the West" manuscript unfolded. 　The Jade Emperor knew that Monkey King was going to go to the Heavenly Palace and was furious. He ordered Li Tianwang to send troops to suppress it. Monkey King defeated the giant spirit god, Nezha third prince, and Heavenly Palace was forced to make him a The Monkey King is in charge of Pan Taoyuan. Unexpectedly, his wild nature has not changed. Instead, he eats flat peaches and drinks immortal wine. The Jade Emperor is furious and ordered Li Tianwang to lead one hundred thousand heavenly soldiers with eighteen heavenly nets to take down the demon. Monkey, Monkey King defeated the evil stars of Jiu Yao, the Big Four The king of heaven made the avatar technique defeat one hundred thousand heavenly soldiers. Because of this battle, Monkey King became famous all over the world. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Xiao Da Yingxiong Maomao Wang
synopsis: The Bull Demon wants to use the world's No. 1 treasure hidden in the Leiyin Temple to destroy the Heavenly Palace and subvert the universe with the weapons that conquer the world. Seven Saints used the central weapon control system to bombard the Tiangong wildly. Under the intimidation of powerful weapons, Tiangong's self-defense system appeared crude and vulnerable. In the offense and defense of the two forces, Tiangong and Leiyin Temple are inlaid together. In order to alleviate the urgent need, King Mao Mao and other partners actively invited Ying to sneak into Leiyin Temple and destroy the central weapon control system to protect the safety of Tiangong.(translated from douban)

title: Maomao Wang Xingqiu Xunbao
synopsis: The Jade Emperor launched a plan to cultivate the next generation to improve the increasingly stale world of immortals. King Mao Mao and his friends were taken as disciples by the immortals to learn immortality. The story begins with King Mao Mao who is practicing in the fairy world. The second class of Zhang Lu fell into the mortal world due to negligence during the demolition of Yuqing Palace. The magic weapon of heaven will cause huge turbulence in the mortal world. The Jade Emperor decided to send the young immortals in training to collect the lost magic weapons to prevent trouble. King Mao Mao, who trained at Monkey King, received the order. The Grand Master gave him a magic treasure recovery record and the magic treasure explorer Diamond Ring. As a result, King Mao Mao took the golden cudgel and cross-dressing cards given by his master, the diamond circle and collection records embarked on a new journey. A small accident caused the magic weapon of the heaven to fall into the world, causing constant disturbances, attracting all kinds of monsters and ghosts. At the moment of danger, King Mao Mao and his friends were ordered to face the unexpected obstruction, they each showed their own special skills. See how the little hero Mao Mao Wang uses his firm belief to fight against the dangers of the treasure hunt. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Maomao Wang Zhi Kongjian Chao Nengli
synopsis: King Mao Mao got the power to manipulate space, causing a lot of trouble. Monkey King puts a bracelet on Mao Maowang to control this terrible power. Wang Mao Mao, who wants to be a great hero, often takes off his bracelet without authorization, causing disturbances time and time again. Finally, under the guidance of Monkey King, King Mao Mao learned the skills to protect his homeland.(translated from Tencent)

title: Taoqi Maomao Wang
synopsis: Mao Mao Wang is a naughty kid. After 99 failed adoptions, he was finally assigned to the home of Uncle Mao who opened a tea restaurant for the 100th time. The two couples have a lovely son, Xiao Mao, but they also like the orphan of this great hero very much. Because of 99 failed adoptions in other families, the newly arrived King Mao Mao was surprised by the enthusiasm of the two people for him, thinking that they had an attempt to laugh at themselves, and that children entering the family would be restrained by their parents and lose their freedom. . The naughty and mischievous Mao Mao Wang dislikes staying at home all day. But he was taken home by Aunt Mao. Aunt Mao introduced him to his new home and family members. When Aunt Mao introduced him to his little brother, Xiao Mao. Wang Mao Mao saw Xiao Mao locked in the room and thought of his future situation, feeling that his freedom was restricted. So, King Mao Mao thought of running away...(translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiyou Tonghua
synopsis: These are some short stories about the brave young King Mao Mao on Mao Mao Island. The story shows a little-known fantasy experience and records the spiritual growth of King Mao Mao. Mao Mao Wang is a naughty kid. In a fantastic dream, King Mao Mao arrived in a magical and beautiful kingdom. When he woke up from the dream, he was still shocked. Dreaming back to the dream, bidding farewell to the dream kingdom, Wang Mao Mao came to the school as usual. In the Xiyoutang school, under the provocation of Bobo, King Mao Mao decided to go to the mysterious cave in the back mountain with his companions at night. The pitch-black cave was horribly grim. The four Mao Mao Wang groped forward. Suddenly, King Mao Mao separated from his partner. He arrived in a mysterious space alone. The panicked King Mao Mao felt dizzy after the world was spinning. In the early morning of the next day, he woke up at Zhu Zhu's call. King Mao Mao was surprised to find that he had been in the kingdom of dreams... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiyou Xin Chuan Zhi Qingshaonian Ziwo Fanghu
synopsis: Thousands of years later, Tang Seng and his disciples once again gather in today's society, to open a new scripture, go to the sea and the sky to find two gems. As the years went by, the personalities of the four masters and apprentices we know have changed. Tang Seng became a narcissistic eye-catcher, and Wu Kong became an arrogant man. Bajie's personality hasn't changed, but he has become fatter again, and speaks fluent Northeastern dialect. As for the sand monks, they are even more powerful, directly becoming a string (commonly known as "cold")... Such a group of people is already very lively, but in order to let the audience feel this unparalleled gluttonous feast, We also unkindly joined a ruthless character-Bru. He has a cold body, a cold mind, and everything cold... In fact, he has to be cold, because he is a robot, too hot and short-circuited. However, because of a tsunami, this robot was short-circuited and turned into a little madman, doing its madness along the way, showing its nerves. Hey... After these people got together, there were many tragedies and farce from the first day they set foot on the journey in search of gems... I don't know what will happen to them all the way down?(translated from douban)

title: Xiyou Xin Chuan Jing Bian Baoxiao Ban
synopsis: Thousands of years later, Tang Seng and his disciples gathered again to open a new scripture and went to various places to find ten gems. As the years went by, the personalities of the four masters and apprentices we know have changed. Tang Seng became a narcissistic eye-catcher, and Wu Kong became an arrogant man. Bajie's personality hasn't changed, but he has become fatter again, and speaks fluent Northeastern dialect. As for the Drifting, it is even more powerful, and it has directly become a tendon... Such a few people get together and it is very lively, and we have unkindly joined a ruthless character-Bru. He has a cold body, a cold mind, and everything cold... In fact, he must be cold, because he is a robot, too hot and short-circuited. However, because of a tsunami, this robot was short-circuited and turned into a little madman, doing its madness along the way, showing its nerves. Hey... After these people got together, from the first day on the journey looking for gems, there were many tragedies and farce...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiyou Xin Chuan
synopsis: In order to find new classics, the four masters and apprentices gather in today's society, but they seem to have subverted the familiar character of the original people. Tang Seng became a lonely self-admiring narcissist, while Monkey King was defiant and became the number one character of Laozi in the world. The fatter and fatter Bajie speaks fluent Northeastern dialect, but the color and heart remain the same; and the most change is the monk Sha He became a ruthless character who didn't hit the south wall without looking back. There is also a robot Blu in the middle, which is cold from the inside to the outside and from top to bottom, because it will short-circuit when heated. There was an earthquake and tsunami on the westbound road, and the flooded Bulguo really short-circuited and became a madman. A group of five people staged a series of hilarious jokes on the way to learn from the scriptures, which made the audience laugh... (translated from douban)

title: Xiyou Chaoji Fen
synopsis: "Journey to the West Super Fan" revolves around a bizarre-looking universal robot Bru and four bizarre teenagers, launching a series of stories closely related to minors. The content relates to the typical elements of adolescents in this particular period, such as study, life, friendship, and affection. The story is small, but not vague. There is true affection between playing, and growth is seen in playing. The blue in the story is more like a companion who grew up with the children. It can realize some strange little dreams of the children during their childhood, some are bad habits, and some are pure and beautiful wishes of the children. In the first "Journey to the West", Bulu was just a robot to protect Tang Seng's master and apprentice. After success, Bulu returned to the aliens and asked the mechanical master to transform him into an ordinary boy. The mechanical master said that as long as Bru went to Shuangfeng Town, became a good friend of the 4 children, and helped them grow up, he would naturally become a real little boy. So Bru went, and the plot of "Journey to the West 2" was drawn. Kicked off...(translated from tencent)

title: Xiyou Chaoji Fen
synopsis: The story happened to 4 elementary school students. 　　 On this day, they were stumped by a piece of composition describing their hometown. After the argument, everyone decided to take the time machine conjured by the universal robot Bulu and travel to ancient times to find inspiration. But he was helplessly involved in a bizarre incident in which aliens invaded primitive tribes. In the end, the four elementary school students worked together and successfully defeated the powerful aliens and helped their new friend Xiaoman rescue the primitive tribe of the thick eyebrow tribe. In joy, the primitive tribes are the prototype of their hometown. In this way, they returned to modern times. After this big adventure, everyone wrote a piece of composition full of truth.(translated from douban)

title: Tu Xia Chuanqi Xuewu Pian
synopsis: The story of "Legend of Rabbit Man Xue Wu Pian" comes from the inheritance of traditional Chinese virtues. It tells the story of Tu Er and his good partners (two meters high, Peony, Kui Zhen, etc.) in the martial arts together. Weak, fighting with the Xuanhu sect led by Xiong Da. In the end, Tu Er and Xiong Da, a pair of good brothers who depended on each other since childhood, grew from a simple and kind-hearted boy to a generation of heroes in the ups and downs of the martial arts. The story is witty and humorous. , The plot is compact, bloody and touching, and the characters are vivid and profound. The difficult choice between the protagonist Tu Er in the martial arts justice and the former brother Xiong Da Friendship shows an admirable heroic style.(translated from douban)

title: Gongfu Xiao Tu Xia
synopsis: Kung fu school friends such as Tu Er and Xuan Ying practice martial arts happily and live happily in the school every day. Suddenly one day, a "Shenfu School" with a sense of science and technology popped up across from the Kungfu School, attracting a large number of children to sign up. Thus, the two schools began a contest between "tradition" and "technology"... The teachers of the Kung Fu School disappeared one after another, and the classmates left one by one. Two children with very different personalities, Tu Er and Xuan Ying, silently guarded their beloved school. At this time, some weird robots appeared in front of them... Click, click, click...(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Tu Xia Zhi Gongfu Xuexiao
synopsis: The film tells the life of Bunnyman in Kung Fu school. The school is located on the Kung Fu Mountain near the capital. The principal is a respected Kung Fu master-Bai Yuan. There are "Tianzi Class" and "Dizi Class" in the school. Students with different personalities in the two classes compete with each other, learn knowledge, and share growing up.(translated from bilibili)

title: Luoke Wangguo Zhi Sheng Long Qishi
synopsis: According to the producer’s disclosure at the kick-off meeting, the film tells the story of a protagonist, Dragon Star, who was originally naughty and did not like to learn. After the Locke Kingdom encounters an extinction disaster, he and his partners are looking for the legendary dragon that can defeat the mysterious dark wizard. Knight, the story of finally saving the kingdom. All small audiences who have played "Rock Kingdom" will be able to intuitively appreciate the familiar characters, magical scenes, and thrilling storylines in the "Rock Kingdom" community through the form of a movie. The magical feast on the screen is about to emerge. (translated from douban)

title: Luoke Wangguo 2: Sheng Long De Xinyuan
synopsis: On a sunny day, friends such as Dragon Star, Otto, Fabia and others led their respective Pokemon duel. In the end, Long Xing and his Abu won the victory, but when they celebrated happily, Abu's hands turned out to be transparent. The worried friends went to inquire Griffin, the dean of the Magic Academy, and learned that Abu might leave Dragon Star. There is only one way to save Abu, and that is to find the legendary cute elf king. Although the future is tedious, the friends decided to give it a try. 　　 After this, Dragon Star, Otto, and the super wordy rap boy Repi went to find Levi, the son of the Elf King, while Tao and Fabia embarked on the other end of the journey. The dangerous adventure is brand-new, and the evil chicken and cow troops will cause more obstacles to them...(translated from douban)

title: Luoke Wangguo 3: Sheng Long De Shouhu
synopsis: The Rainbow Bridge connecting Locke Kingdom and Sky City is about to collapse, facing a major crisis of the end. The Holy Dragon Knight is responsible for protecting the kingdom and must gather the "Holy Light Stones" from both the "heaven and the earth" within 72 hours to summon the Winged Elf King to save the kingdom. However, betrayal, framing, and calamity followed one after another, and the Holy Dragon Knight encountered many crises and was almost desperate. In the vast world, where the Holy Light Stone is, and who the Wing Element Elf King is, are all unknown. Locke Kingdom is at stake. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Luoke Wangguo 4: Chufa! Juren Gu
synopsis: In the ancient legend of King Locke, there is a mysterious place that is remote and like a fairyland. The most knowledgeable people do not know its location, and the most detailed maps will not include its traces. This is the Valley of the Giants. In the Valley of the Giants, the energy guardian Maqiu (voiced by Zhang Qi) lives, and its existence is related to the safety of the entire world. 　　One day, the iron hoof of the evil Enzo (voiced by Zhao Lu) broke through the tranquility of the Giants Valley, and its chicken and bull troops attacked the Giants Valley and took away the sleeping ball. The departure of Maqiu brought a heavy blow to the Valley of the Giants, and the entire valley was in crisis, a scene of hell. Enzo wants to achieve its ambition to rule the world by controlling the hemp ball. The righteous and kind Locke (voiced by Tao Dian) and Coricia (voiced by Guan Xiaotong) will naturally not let its conspiracy succeed. (translated from douban)

title: Luoke Wangguo Fuhuo Chuanshuo
synopsis: Locke found the mysterious resurrection scroll in the crystal cave. The scroll said that as long as you find 3 magical objects, you can resurrect any life! But the scroll was snatched by Enzo. In order to prevent Enzo from using the scroll to awaken the powerful demons and launch an attack on the kingdom, the little Rocks decided to take the initiative to stop Enzo's conspiracy. (translated from douban)

title: Luoke Wangguo Guangming Kaixuan
synopsis: Rock, Dimo, and Princess Keli have gone through trials and opened the door of the Temple of Light. But what appeared before them turned out to be a black and white world. No matter the ground, the sky, or the surrounding trees and buildings of various shapes, there are only two colors of black and white... Even pets have become white stones. . 　　 One after another mystery is waiting for Dimo and his friends to find the answer. It is full of all kinds of weirdness and crisis. At the same time, in the darkness, a pair of cunning eyes keeps watching them...(translated from douban)

title: I Wanna Be Your Friend
synopsis: An award-winning short film following a claymation figure trying to befriend others. As stated in the video's official synopsis, "For friendship it is the most important to be cooperative."
background: This short won the 17th Bucheon International Animation Festival, Student Film Competition Audience Award in 2015.

title: I Think You're a Little Confused
synopsis: One day a letter takes a blood-sausage to his friend, liver-sausage. So, he went... (Source: Geidai Animation)
