title: Luoke Wangguo Da Maoxian
synopsis: The first season of Rock Kingdom Adventure has 52 episodes. When the Locke Kingdom School of Magic started, there was a big explosion in the experimental workshop. The brave Locke, the little princess Coricia, and his good friend Felt went to investigate and arrest the nasty suspect together. (translated from douban)

title: Luoke Wangguo Da Maoxian 2: En Zuo Riji
synopsis: When Locke and his friends were cleaning the library, they found a mysterious diary; they were inhaled into the diary world. In this new and different dimension, there are funny pets, domineering lords, unpredictable earls, banshees, and the owners of the Dark Mountain Villa. Behind all of this is...delllock, Keli and Firth, will How about a thrilling, novel and fun adventure, and finally, can you escape from the diary? Hurry up, a brand new season of Locke Kingdom animation-"Enzo Diary" is waiting for you! (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 洛克王国大冒险2：恩佐日记

title: Luoke Wangguo Da Maoxian 3: Bada Huizhang
synopsis: The new school year has begun. Locke and his partners study hard and challenge the most difficult badges. However, when the Kingdom of Locke and his friends stepped into the dark space for the first time, they learned that the college had encountered an unprecedented crisis. Due to the distortion of time, they returned to the college a month later. Enzo and the teacher are controlled by Enzo. Locke and his friends tried their best to return to the original time and space. The Holy Light Feather Stone they found shattered Enzo's conspiracy, and the crisis in the academy was quietly lifted.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 洛克王国大冒险3：八大徽章

title: Luoke Wangguo Xuan Yu Dao Lixian Ji
synopsis: One day a mysterious event suddenly appeared in the peaceful Locke Kingdom. Three mysterious pets appeared on Xuanyu Island. The brave Locke wanted to find out and embarked on an adventure trip to Xuanyu Island alone. What wonderful things will Locke encounter this time? Can Locke lift the veil of this mysterious incident? All the answers will be revealed for you in "The Adventures of Xuanyu Island"! (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 洛克王国玄玉岛历险记

title: Luoke Wangguo Wudao Hui
synopsis: The annual "Rock Kingdom Magic Contest" is about to be held, and the prize turned out to be the legendary King Arthur's magic book. Rocky, who wants to become a great magician, is naturally not far behind. Because of the need to form a team, Rocky joined Firth to form a team and conduct various special trainings! ! ! The little princess Corisha and Sally also joined the ranks of contestants. But no one knew that the man in black was also coveting King Arthur's magic book! The man in black took advantage of Feide's desire for championship and power, and secretly manipulated Feide with black magic. Although Feide seems to be getting stronger and stronger, it is getting more and more dangerous! Can Felt, who has been bullied by Feder all the time, defeat his own demon, and whether the plan of the man in black can finally succeed?(translated from douban)

title: Luoke Wangguo Da Maoxian Zhi Ya Ya Yue Da Xian Shenwei
synopsis: Many children in the Locke Kingdom suddenly got a strange dental disease, even Princess Keli also got this disease, so Dean Griffin told Locke and Felt that they hoped to find the legendary guardian beast with their enthusiasm. - "One-horned Pegasus" can have a solved Rubik's Cube. So, in order to find the Unicorn Pegasus, Rock and Felt took their pets to a magical country-the Kingdom of Yale. With the help of the four elves of Pippi, Tiantian, Yaya, and Wangcai from the "Yangya Music Kingdom", Locke and his team passed the battle. In the end, they defeated all kinds of tooth fungus, and finally found a unicorn, healed the students' oral problems, and taught the students to use the toothpaste, and adhere to the good habit of brushing their teeth in the morning and evening. The Locke Kingdom has restored the peace of the past. The king also led the citizens of the Locke Kingdom to hold a grand Guinness Tooth Protection Award ceremony. At the ceremony, various small teeth protection animals from the natural world participated, and the snail was rated as the most toothed The sturdy animals, squirrels and moles were rated as the sharpest and mighty little animals. Of course, the tooth protector award was finally won by Yaya Le, and Pippi, Tiantian, Yaya and Wangcai also Being named knights of tooth protectors, with the title of honor, they will embark on a new journey of tooth protectors!(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 洛克王国大冒险之伢牙乐大显神威

title: Shaonian Yuefei Chuanqi
synopsis: As an animation giant with a legendary style, the film takes Yue Fei, a famous historical figure who has stayed in a thousand history, as the protagonist, telling how he turned from a suffering child to a talented and heroic teenager. The story of the film unfolds around a rich plot: why a thousand-year-old turtle spirit tried every means to kill him; how a little snake incarnates a beautiful girl (red bean) and Yue Fei developed an ignorant love; two daring and sharing difficulties How good brothers (Wang Feng, Niu Gao) embarked on a surprising and exciting journey with Yue Fei; conquered a thousand-year-old turtle spirit, giant python, and evil leopard, defeated all masters, shot the king Xiaoliang, tattooed the mother-in-law, and finally became Wu Zhuangyuan.(translated from douban)

title: Xiongmao Zongdongyuan
synopsis: After millions of years of evolution, the panda family has gone through countless difficulties and obstacles and has come to today. Although the endangered pandas have been cared for by humans, an unprecedented disaster is about to sweep their habitats, and heavy storms will trigger floods and destroy the panda family. Worried about the fate of their children and grandchildren, the ancestors asked the Panda Bodhisattva (voiced by Zhao Zhongxiang). The Bodhisattva predicted that a super panda that inherited the wisdom of the ancestors would be born and save the fate of the nation. At the same time, a red panda named Pan Di (voiced by He Jiong) was born in the forest. At this moment, he still does not know his mission. 　　 The naughty and mischievous Pandey has caused a lot of trouble, has gone through many tests, and made many good friends. Under the guidance of one of the ancestors (voiced by Li Yang), Pandey gradually assumed the responsibility of the future of his clan...(translated from douban)

title: Pacific Rim: The Black
synopsis: There was a time when Kaiju rose from the Pacific Rim only to encounter gigantic robots, Jaegers, built to fight them back. That time has passed. Now, Australia has been overrun by Kaiju, forcing the evacuation of an entire continent. Left behind, teenage siblings Taylor and Hayley embark on a desperate search for their missing parents, teaching themselves to pilot a battered, long-abandoned Jaeger to help in their quest and give them even the slightest hope of surviving.

title: Xiongmao Chuan
synopsis: This film mainly tells Lin Xiongmao, how an ordinary little person works part-time as a waiter in Beijing, how to learn to communicate with colleagues, and how to survive in the imperial capital. 　　 "Hello everyone, my name is Lin Panda, you can also call Lin Xiong Mao!" 　　 On the first day I came to the Imperial Capital to see the Bei Diao in Tiananmen Square, but was pulled to the Ming Tombs by a black car, it was really awesome. No wonder the little public drivers admire our "chest hair". I don’t know that Lin Xiongmao’s job hunting life in Beijing will look like a magical horse. Maybe it’s like "Tired" (quoted from the album "China Fire I") sung by the Red Troops in the play: "I want to be strong, but also stubborn. , But I don’t have the courage, my mind is gray. Time is like running water, time is so precious, today you and I still don’t know anything." "Chest Hair" is nineteen years old and is a Beipiao nationality. He is good at adult comics and he is good at adult comics. When applying for a job in the Imperial Capital, he must have a back seat in the car. You must buy two tickets depending on your weight and height. MT's, to be honest, 19-year-old Lin Xianmao does not only eat, but P can't (the MS stunt is to shake his face). The next day, I left the Ming Tombs and took a black car to a small animation-making unit to apply. Because the paintings were too unsuitable for young children (not conducive to the growth of young people ==~!), I had to choose when the boss went away. Be a security guard at the entrance of the station. Lin's chest hair hits the wall everywhere in the workplace. He has a simple personality, lacks a brain, and is slow to respond. Except for a face that looks like a hip, it seems that everything he does is wrong~~~ Lin Xiongmao also has tenderness. He didn't reveal the hardships of life to the call from home, saying that everything was okay. On the first day of work, because there was no place to live, he had to sleep in the company. During the time, Lin Xiongmao turned over the boss's drawer (found a " "The Queen and the Five Men" film, I found it was a Saint Seiya when I was stunned~~~), the boss sympathized with him and let him stay for one night. When the boss locked the door and left, the panda realized that he was in a hurry, but Found no place to defecate. . . The next day, colleague Ah Meng (Despicable Marvis) found shit in the lunch box and urine in the soda bottle. . . ~~~ (In order to condemn Amon’s questioning, Brother Xiongmao drank the liquid in the bottle very aggressively ==~!) Later, Xiongmao accidentally forgot his stool in the restaurant when he had lunch. The Northeast boss chased him wildly! In the end, he was punished to volunteer for a part-time job in the restaurant, and the original boss paid him. With a grudge, Ah Meng sent a friend "called a beast" to stop him in the middle of the night and blackmailed him away for more than 100 yuan~~~~~Because he did not have a temporary residence permit, he was chased by police on the street~~~~~ It rained night to avoid the rain. Wrongly hiding in the "hair salon" (he thought it was a haircut ==~!) ~~~~~ I sent my colleague Xiaota home but found that Xiaota sister was a hair salon girl~~~~~~ 　　 In this way, in a very two-stage plot, his chest hair began his bitter life in Beijing~~~~~~(translated from douban)

title: Zhi Qu Wei Hu Shan
synopsis: Under the leadership of the regiment chief of staff Shao Jianbo, the People's Liberation Army's anti-bandit squad relied on the terrain to bypass the Eighteen Natural Hazards, crossed the Nipou Mountain from the top of the Eagle's Mouth, and surprised the bandit's nest. The small bandit leader Luan Ping took advantage of the chaos to escape, and the reconnaissance hero Yang Zirong found the clues in time. With the help of the little squirrel "Big Tail", he tracked and captured Luan Ping. 　　 The nipple mountain bandits won a big victory. The next target of the squad to suppress bandits is the stubborn mountain eagle in Weihu Mountain. After careful thinking, Shao Jianbo formulated a new combat plan. Yang Zirong was ordered to disguise as Nipou Mountain's slip-through bandits, and follow the footsteps of the Weihu Mountain scouts deliberately let go by the squad, into the reckless jungle, and fight the tigers bravely when lost. The gunshots attracted the bandits who entered the mountain to hunt-Ma Laoliu of the Eight King Kong under the mountain carved tent. Yang Zirong followed Ma Lao Liu into the Weihu Mountain bandit den, calmly and wittily responded to the interrogation of the mountain eagle, and presented a military contact map. Although Yang Zirong was left behind by the suspicious mountain eagle, he was still wary of him. 　　 A series of land reform measures taken by Shao Jianbo in Jiapigou and his team’s words and deeds of loving and protecting the people made the local people completely accept this people’s army. Zuoshan Diao received the order to make a plan to ambush the transport train bound for Jiapigou. 　　 Yang Zirong pretended to hunt and wanted to sneak down the mountain to pass the mountain eagle's plan to the team. He almost revealed his identity. Fortunately, the allergic reaction of "Big Tail" exposed the whereabouts of the bandit who was following him. Yang Zirong turned the danger to a breeze, but the dilemma that the news could not be delivered made him feel like a needle. 　　The story unfolds... (translated from douban)

title: Shangguan Hai Ling
synopsis: Hailing is a girl who loves daydreaming. She is not as quiet and easy to learn as her childhood sweetheart. She has unrealistic things in her mind all day long. Hailing went to high school in 2007, but at this time she discovered that her fantasy gradually became reality and she became almost omnipotent. With the passage of time, Hailing began to face herself, whether this is the beginning of fantasy happiness or a nightmare The precursor to the advent... Fantasy and reality, which one is the real self and which is the real Shangguan Hailing. (translated from douban)

title: Zao Meng Zhe
synopsis: The story will revolve around the virtual and real life, work, and feelings of the male protagonist Xiao Sa, telling an inspirational story of game players. The film is actually somewhat suspenseful and very realistic at the same time. I am afraid that for some viewers, this film is very literary. Although it is interspersed with majestic virtual worlds and various entanglements in the virtual world from time to time, this film , The description of contemporary young people is fairly successful. This film pays great attention to the portrayal of characters, delicate performances, and emphasizes the concept of virtual actors. The era is moving more and more towards virtualization. Whether it is the booming development of the game industry or the virtual era that is constantly emphasized in major movies, it is slow Slowly emerges the concept that virtual actors will replace real actors? This will be a new movie model that may emerge. "Avatar" is doing a great job. With the advancement of technology, the cost will become smaller and smaller. It is naturally impossible for us to compare with any big movie that is really going to the theater. Just sneaked out a small step in this direction. Therefore, in this film, we focus on depicting people and depicting a vivid virtual actor. The story itself is not a shocking event that saves the world and fights the devil. It starts from our lives, from the most basic, and talks about our players. The story, this is the first time our crew has produced a film in the mode of a movie. The engineering files produced by this film are more than all 7 episodes of "Warriors of the Alliance". The film length has reached 30 minutes, and the screen is more than "Warriors". With a qualitative leap, the action design has completely opened the distance. The plot has been carefully designed. Maybe some viewers may not understand it, but it doesn’t matter. Since the film runs only 30 minutes, we can’t talk too much. Complete, but every shot, every line, every plot has been designed, and the audience may find the answer in the film, or find the answer in reality. (translated from douban)

title: Zhao Shi Gu'Er
synopsis: This film tells the story of the Jin Dynasty general Tu Anjia murdering Zhao Dun, the loyal and straight minister, and killing more than 300 people in the Zhao family by any means. Only the infant baby of Zhao Dun's grandson was rescued by Cheng Ying. After Tu Anjia discovered that someone had secretly rescued the orphan, he actually ordered the massacre of all children over one and a half months old in the country. In order to protect the orphans and children from all over the country, Cheng Ying resolutely sacrificed his son to pretend to be the orphan. In the end, the son of the old minister Gongsun Chujiu and Cheng Ying were killed, and the Zhao orphan was saved. Cheng Ying took the orphans to hide in Tibet for 15 years. After that, Zhao Wu, who grew up, with the help of ministers, punished Tu Anjia and avenged his blood and hatred. Cheng Ying drew his sword to comfort his dead relatives and friends...(translated from douban)

title: Dance In The Vampire Bund Intermission
synopsis: Intermissions included in the Blu-ray/DVD of "Dance in the Vampire Bund".

details.English: Dance In The Vampire Bund Intermission
details.Japanese: ダンスインザヴァンパイアバンドIntermission

title: Min De 1911
synopsis: In 1911, the ancient city of Wuchang was stationed with an army based on Western military ideas, called the New Army. Like other new-style troops across the country, they pinned the Qing Dynasty’s last hope to maintain its shaky rule. 　　 At this time in Wuchang City, the activities of a group of mysterious people added tension to the city. This group of people are collectively called the Revolutionary Party, and they belong to three different organizations-the Japanese Association, the Gongjin Society, and the Literary Society. With the cover of church activities and literary activities, they secretly planned a violent revolution. In order to succeed, the Revolutionary Party came up with the genius idea of ​​recruiting soldiers from the new army to join the revolution. They gradually gathered uprising forces within the army, while waiting for the opportunity of the revolution... 　　 In May, a mass movement took place in the neighboring province of Sichuan. The tense ruler hurriedly dispatched some new troops from Wuchang to suppress it. The military strength in Wuchang city declined, and the Revolutionary Party felt that the time for an uprising had arrived. However, the process of the uprising was full of twists and turns: When the leader of the Revolutionary Party deployed the uprising arrangement, the soldiers of the Nanhu Pao Camp in Chengnan accidentally leaked news of the uprising due to drinking and making trouble. The revolution failed for the first time; the Revolutionary Party manufactured explosives in the Hankou Concession. At the time, the operation error caused the bomb to explode, the list of revolutionary party members was searched, the leader of the revolutionary party was forced to flee the city, and the revolutionary plan failed for the second time; the revolutionary party decided to advance the uprising, but the ruler blocked the whole city and the news of the uprising was not available It was communicated to the soldiers in time, and the uprising plan failed for the third time; during this period, the ruler launched a hysterical counterattack, conducted a large-scale search of the city, and killed the backbone of the Revolutionary Party... 　　 In the most critical time, the soldiers at the bottom were determined to save themselves. In the evening of October 10th, the uprising broke out with a gunshot from the soldiers of the uprising. Soldiers from all military camps heard the gunshots and all took part in the action. They aimed their artillery at the Governor's Mansion. After fierce fighting, the Qing army retreated steadily and high-ranking officials fled. In the early morning of the 11th, the entire Wuchang city was completely controlled by the Revolutionary Party. At dawn, the 18-star flag of the Revolutionary Party was planted on the tower of Wuchang. 　　 On October 17, 1911, a ceremony to symbolize victory and a call for revolution to the whole country was held in Wuchang Yuemachang. People were very excited. This uprising and the ensuing national revolution put an end to China's monarchy for more than two thousand years. (translated from douban)

title: Fei Wen Ji
synopsis: In the little-known Qili Town, people are dismissing a boring life. In a small restaurant called "Fei" in the local area, three worm-like college students work in it. Huang Chongzi was in a trance, completely absent, and even forgot to accept the customer's money. Hei Chongzi served the food and drove venture capital with customers everywhere; Red Chongzi was originally very patient, but after being tortured by customers, he shot and hurt people. Angrily, Brother Qiang swept the three people out. It just happened that E-GATE, a well-known company in the world's top 500, was hiring, and the three guys came together to apply. At this time, the company's door was already full of graduates waiting here all night, including students from famous universities. 　　 The cruel interview process, countless people failed miserably, blood flowed. What awaits them are not only harsh questions, but also extreme application conditions. At the same time, "Fei" also held a recruitment ceremony...(translated from douban)

title: Haixian Lu Zhandui
synopsis: The original concept of the film is to tell that sharks are tired of underwater life and go to land in search of new food. The friendly relationship between the two shark protagonists, Xiaobao and Dabai, the beautiful ocean is being polluted and destroyed by humans, plus the hateful The eel and other interesting character arrangements. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Sulinna Qiyu Ji
synopsis: The cartoon "Su Linna's Adventure" is about a ten-year-old girl Su Linna accidentally encountering space ambassador Le Lexiong and an outer space robot twisting two babies during her vacation, and then accidentally encountering a computer chip, and inadvertently broke into it. A video game designed in outer space, followed by a series of intersecting virtual and real, time-space conversion games from illusion to reality, from ancient culture to contemporary technology, so that Su Linna had a good time in the game of fantasy. Addiction, but also let her learn to understand, see kindness, and experience true love.(translated from douban)

title: Ke Yao Shanlin Zhi Duocai De Jiayuan
synopsis: This film tells the story of friends in the forest who were severely punished for not caring for their homes. Duo Mi took the friends and started planting trees and building their homes. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 可乐山林之多彩的家园

title: Ke Yao Shanlin Zhi Fengshou De Jijie
synopsis: This film revolves around the story between the kangaroo boss Domi and the savage and playful little fox Tada in the forest, making everyone understand the importance of unity. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 可乐山林之丰收的季节

title: Chuang Tang Tu
synopsis: The quiet and peaceful town of Chuangtang is about to usher in the much-anticipated wishing convention, and the townspeople will work together for this grand ceremony. Chuangtang Rabbit’s father, Tu Fei, is an extremely intelligent and knowledgeable doctor. The doctor disappeared from the town with the "wheel of Chuangtang" for some reason, and became angry with the mayor’s grandfather. "Tang Zhilun" has become a taboo topic in the town. Although he and his younger brother were also involved in the preparations for the festival, they rushed to make a lot of jokes. Under grandpa's scolding, they accompanied the beautiful kitten and butterfly to the temple to check the power system, but accidentally found mysterious people underground. These people seemed to be planning to destroy the festival. In order to ensure the smooth progress of the Wishing Conference, Chong Tong Hao and they worked together to fight these bad guys, but found that there was a bigger conspiracy behind them... (translated from douban)
